title: Top Places to visit in Prakasam, Ongole, Andhra Pradesh
content: Prakasam district is an administrative district in the Coastal Andhra region of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. The headquarters of the district are located at Ongole. It is located on the western shore of Bay of Bengal and is bounded by Guntur district on the north, Kurnool district on the w

title: Top Places to visit in Kurnool, Andhra Pradesh
content: Kurnool is the headquarters of Kurnool district in the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh.[5] The city is often referred as The Gateway of Rayalaseema.[6] It was the capital of Andhra State from 1 October 1953 to 31 October 1956. As of 2011 census, it is the fifth most populous city in the state with

title: Top Places to visit in Krishna, Machilipatnam, Andhra Pradesh
content: Krishna district is an administrative district in the Coastal Andhra region of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. Machilipatnam is the administrative headquarters and Vijayawada is the most populated city in the district. It has an area of 8,727 km2 (3,370 sq mi) and had a population of 45,29,00

title: Top Places to visit in Kadapa, Andhra Pradesh
content: Kadapa (alternatively spelled Cuddapah) is a city in the Rayalseema region of the south-central part of Andhra Pradesh, India . It is the district headquarters of Kadapa district. As of 2011 Census of India, the city had a population of 344,078. It is located 8 kilometres (5.0 mi) south of the Pe

title: Top Places to visit in Guntur, Andhra Pradesh
content: Guntur (About this soundpronunciation (help·info)); is a city within the Andhra Pradesh Capital Region. title: Top Places to visit in East Godavari , Kakinada , Andhra Pradesh
content: East Godavari district or Toorpu Godavari Jilla is a district in Coastal Andhra region of Andhra Pradesh, India. Its district headquarters is at Kakinada. As of Census 2011, it became the most populous district of the state with a population of 5,151,549. Rajahmundry and Kakinada are the two larg

title: Top Places to visit in Chittoor, Andhra Pradesh
content: Chittoor is a city and district headquarters in Chittoor district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is also the mandal and divisional headquarters of Chittoor mandal and Chittoor revenue division, respectively. The city has a population of 2,89,625 and that of the agglomeration is 3,53,76

title: Top Places to visit in Anantapur, Andhra Pradesh
content: Anantapur (officially:Anantapuramu) is a city in Anantapur district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is the mandal headquarters of Anantapuramu mandal and also the divisional headquarters of Anantapur revenue division. The city is located on National Highway. It was also the headquarters

title: Top Places to visit in South Andaman (Port Blair), Andaman and Nicobar
content: South Andaman district is one of the 3 districts of the Indian Union Territory of Andaman and Nicobar Islands located in the Bay of Bengal. Port Blair town, the capital of the Union Territory is the district headquarters. The area covered by this district is 2980 km².

title: Top Places to visit in North and Middle Andaman (Mayabunder), Andaman and Nicobar
content:
North and Middle Andaman district is one of the 3 districts of the Indian Union Territory of Andaman and Nicobar Islands located in the Bay of Bengal. Mayabunder town is the district headquarters. The area covered by this district is 3251.85 km2.

title: Top Places to visit in Nicobar (Car Nicobar), Andaman and Nicobar
Top Places to visit in West Champaran (Bettiah), Bihar
content: West Champaran is an administrative district in the state of Bihar in India, located just 60 km (37 mi) west of Birgunj. It is a part of Tirhut Division[1] (Tirhut).
